info.title: agentOS API V3, Maintenance Call Group

post.summary: Create a maintenance job for a specific branch

parameters.name: branchID
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Branch

requestBody.description: A JSON object containing details of the maintenance job

URL.description: The document URL (This has to be public)

MaintenanceDocumentModel.description: Submission Model - Handles all the fields required to attach documents to an online maintenance job

Documents.description: Documents linked to a submitted maintenance job

ExternalID.description: ID used externally to manage jobs before sending to the system. This has a 10 character limit.

IssuePriority.description: The priority of the job (Defaults to 'Low' if incorrect value or empty)

PropertyAddress1.description: The first line of the property address

PropertyAddress2.description: The second line of the property address

PropertyAddress3.description: The third line of the property address

PropertyAddress4.description: The forth line of the property address

PropertyCountry.description: The country the property is located

ReportedAt.description: The date the job was reported

TenantEMailAddress.description: The email address of the Tenant

TenantPhonePrimary.description: The primary phone number of the Tenant

TenantPhoneSecondary.description: The secondary phone number of the Tenant

TenantPresenceRequested.description: Is the Tenant’s presence requested during the maintenance visit? (Defaults to “false” if incorrect value or empty)

MaintenanceIssueModel.description: Submission Model - Handles all fields required to submit an online maintenance job
